lines.text: I'm going to put it where it belongs
Dedric, what about the taxi driver?
Jumped out of a window at the Gestapo. They'll get nothing from him.
I never met him. I wish I did.

[Slamming his fist on the table]
Miss Novotny, this time you're going to talk!
Your mothers were slimy rats! Their milk was sewer water!
